import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./Clients.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Clients=()=>{const[currentIndex,setCurrentIndex]=useState(0);// 客户logo数组 - 简化为8张图片
const clientLogos=[{id:1,image:"/images/c1.jpg",alt:"Client 1"},{id:2,image:"/images/c2.png",alt:"Client 2"},{id:3,image:"/images/c3.jpg",alt:"Client 3"},{id:4,image:"/images/c4.png",alt:"Client 4"},{id:5,image:"/images/c5.jpg",alt:"Client 5"},{id:6,image:"/images/c6.jpg",alt:"Client 6"},{id:7,image:"/images/c7.jpg",alt:"Client 7"},{id:8,image:"/images/c8.png",alt:"Client 8"}];// 每页显示4个logo，总共2页（4+4）
const itemsPerPage=4;const totalPages=Math.ceil(clientLogos.length/itemsPerPage);// 自动播放
useEffect(()=>{const interval=setInterval(()=>{setCurrentIndex(prev=>(prev+1)%totalPages);},4000);// 每4秒切换
return()=>clearInterval(interval);},[totalPages]);// 获取当前页的logo
const getCurrentPageLogos=()=>{const startIndex=currentIndex*itemsPerPage;return clientLogos.slice(startIndex,startIndex+itemsPerPage);};const nextSlide=()=>{setCurrentIndex(prev=>(prev+1)%totalPages);};const prevSlide=()=>{setCurrentIndex(prev=>(prev-1+totalPages)%totalPages);};const goToSlide=index=>{setCurrentIndex(index);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"clients section",id:"clients",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section-title",children:"Clients"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"section-line"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"clients-carousel",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"clients-row",children:getCurrentPageLogos().map(logo=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"client-logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo.image,alt:logo.alt,onError:e=>{e.target.style.display='none';e.target.parentElement.style.backgroundColor='#ffffff';}})},logo.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"carousel-control prev",onClick:prevSlide,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("svg",{width:"24",height:"24",viewBox:"0 0 24 24",fill:"none",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("path",{d:"M15 18L9 12L15 6",stroke:"currentColor",strokeWidth:"2",strokeLinecap:"round",strokeLinejoin:"round"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"carousel-control next",onClick:nextSlide,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("svg",{width:"24",height:"24",viewBox:"0 0 24 24",fill:"none",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("path",{d:"M9 18L15 12L9 6",stroke:"currentColor",strokeWidth:"2",strokeLinecap:"round",strokeLinejoin:"round"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"carousel-indicators",children:Array.from({length:totalPages}).map((_,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:`indicator ${index===currentIndex?'active':''}`,onClick:()=>goToSlide(index)},index))})]})]})});};export default Clients;
